name: Loaf Saver
description:
PLEASE READ TUTORIAL @ BOTTOM OF THE PAGE!

The Bread is baking. Time is running out...

Sit back, relax, and enjoy 6 cute, chill, bread-filled puzzles.

Made by Harry and Tomo AKA Thrifty Elixir

ps. you may experience audio glitching (something to do with the export?). apologies if that happens! also... no end screen, sorry!

Enjoy! :)

TUTORIAL

Setup: MAKE FULLSCREEN, then click on the window to make sure it registers your inputs.

Goal: save as much bread from burning as you can (by reaching the ovens in time)

To get bread from the ovens, press in the direction that they are in: THIS DOES NOT COST A MOVE.

On the left of the screen you will see how many moves you have, and the TWO BUTTONS you can press. You can in fact press all 4 arrow keys, but the catch is that ONLY 2 of them cost 1 move, and any other button will cost you 2.

However, sometimes you may have to make use of sub-optimal buttons in order to progress...
